# Refactoring: {feature_description}

## Overview
Auto-generated workflow for refactoring {feature_description}.

## Prerequisites
- [ ] Codebase analyzed
- [ ] Refactoring scope defined

## Phase 1: Current State Analysis
- [ ] Step 1.1: Run list_error_patterns() or relevant pattern tool
- [ ] Step 1.2: Identify all affected files
- [ ] Step 1.3: Document current implementation

## Phase 2: Impact Analysis
- [ ] Step 2.1: Run trace_feature() to understand dependencies
- [ ] Step 2.2: Identify breaking changes
- [ ] Step 2.3: Plan migration strategy

## Phase 3: Planning
- [ ] Step 3.1: Create refactoring specification
- [ ] Step 3.2: Run validate_against_codebase(spec=...)
- [ ] Step 3.3: Plan rollback strategy

## Phase 4: Implementation
- [ ] Step 4.1: Create new implementations
- [ ] Step 4.2: Update tests
- [ ] Step 4.3: Migrate existing code
- [ ] Step 4.4: Remove deprecated code

## Phase 5: Validation
- [ ] Step 5.1: Run all tests
- [ ] Step 5.2: Run check_consistency(focus="all")
- [ ] Step 5.3: Performance testing
- [ ] Step 5.4: Manual testing

## Phase 6: Documentation
- [ ] Step 6.1: Update documentation
- [ ] Step 6.2: Add migration guide
- [ ] Step 6.3: Update changelog
